resources.string: Welcome to KEAs computer science rating app!
We would love to hear about your experience in your courses and with your teachers to help us improve the quality of the education for new and existing students.
Please select a teacher or course below. Swap Selections by toggling the button.
Do you find the course relevant or not?
Does the course live up to your expectations?
Do you find the course too difficult?
Are you happy with the provided course materials?
Do you think the Course increase your chance of getting a job?
Is the teacher well prepared for the lectures?
Do you feel satisfied with the teachers ability to help you?
Does the teacher provide you with enough feedback?
Does the teacher provide relevant and understandable examples?
Are the teachers assignments too difficult?
